title: CBIC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 11 Tax Assistant and Havaldar Posts
description: The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 11 Tax Assistant and Havaldar Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the CBIC Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before th...
